alert.note: Alert for Southeast Suffolk; Southwest Suffolk (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Statement issued January 20 at 1:47PM EST until January 21 at 11:00AM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Up to one half foot of inundation above ground level expected in vulnerable areas near the waterfront and shoreline. * WHERE...Southwest Suffolk and Southeast Suffolk Counties. * WHEN...From late tonight through Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...Brief minor flooding of the most vulnerable locations near the waterfront and shoreline. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Additional rounds of minor coastal flooding are possible for the Sunday and Monday morning high tide cycles.
info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roadways.
